languages.text: "Обрезать нить целого мира, но не дать скверне распространиться — сие угодно Неумирающему. Да примет Тассера священную смерть по воле Домин!"
"To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."
languages.original_text: "Обрезать нить целого мира, но не дать скверне распространиться — сие угодно Неумирающему. Да примет Тассера священную смерть по воле Домин!"

traits.locale_text: "To cut the thread of an entire world but stop the corruption from spreading is to please the Undying Emperor. Domin's will be done, may Thassera accept a sacred death."
"To cut the thread of an entire world but stop the corruption from spreading is to please the Undying Emperor. Domin's will be done, may Thassera accept a sacred death."
"To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."
"To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."
"To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."
"To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."

languages.text: "Den Faden einer ganzen Welt zu durchtrennen, aber die Verbreitung der Verderbtheit zu verhindern, erfreut den todlosen Imperator. Möge der Wille {mf|des|der} Domin geschehen und Thassera seinen heiligen Tod akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."

traits.locale_text: "Den Faden einer ganzen Welt zu durchtrennen, aber die Verbreitung der Verderbtheit zu verhindern, erfreut den todlosen Imperator. Möge der Wille {mf|des|der} Domin geschehen und Thassera seinen heiligen Tod akzeptieren."

languages.text: « Il plairait à l'Empereur Immortel que l'on tranche le fil d'un monde entier afin d'empêcher la corruption de se propager. La volonté {mf|du|de la} Domin serait faite ; puisse Thassera accepter sa mort sacrée. »
languages.original_text: "To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."

traits.locale_text: « Il plairait à l'Empereur Immortel que l'on tranche le fil d'un monde entier afin d'empêcher la corruption de se propager. La volonté {mf|du|de la} Domin serait faite ; puisse Thassera accepter sa mort sacrée. »

languages.text: “切断整个世界的丝线，以此阻止腐化的蔓延。这个决定会让不死神皇非常满意。秘者的意志必将实现，愿塔瑟拉接受它神圣的死亡。”
languages.original_text: "To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."

traits.locale_text: “切断整个世界的丝线，以此阻止腐化的蔓延。这个决定会让不死神皇非常满意。秘者的意志必将实现，愿塔瑟拉接受它神圣的死亡。”

languages.text: «Cortar el hilo de todo un mundo para evitar que se extienda la corrupción complace al Emperador Inmortal. Se hará la voluntad de{mf|l| la} Domin. Que Thassera acepte su muerte sagrada».
languages.original_text: "To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."

traits.locale_text: «Cortar el hilo de todo un mundo para evitar que se extienda la corrupción complace al Emperador Inmortal. Se hará la voluntad de{mf|l| la} Domin. Que Thassera acepte su muerte sagrada».

languages.text: 「一つの世界の糸を断ち切りながらも堕落の蔓延を防ぐことは、不死の皇帝を喜ばせることです。ドミンの意志が成され、タッセーラがその神聖な死を受け入れますように」
languages.original_text: "To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."

traits.locale_text: 「一つの世界の糸を断ち切りながらも堕落の蔓延を防ぐことは、不死の皇帝を喜ばせることです。ドミンの意志が成され、タッセーラがその神聖な死を受け入れますように」

languages.text: "Koca bir dünyanın ipliğini kesip yozlaşmanın yayılmasını önlemek, Ölmeyen İmparator'u memnun etmektir. Domin'in iradesi yerine gelsin, Thassera da kutsal ölümünü kabul etsin."
languages.original_text: "To cut the thread of an entire world but prevent the spread of corruption is to please the Undying Emperor. The Domin's will be done, and may Thassera accept its sacred death."

traits.locale_text: "Koca bir dünyanın ipliğini kesip yozlaşmanın yayılmasını önlemek, Ölmeyen İmparator'u memnun etmektir. Domin'in iradesi yerine gelsin, Thassera da kutsal ölümünü kabul etsin."
